hours_text:
## Hours & Admission

**Winter/Spring** – February 6 through May 22  
**Hours** – Thursday through Monday, 9:30 AM to 5 PM

**Peak Season** – May 23 through September 2  
**Hours** – Open Daily, 9:30 AM to 5 PM

**Fall/Winter** – September 3 through December 23  
**Hours** – Thursday through Monday, 9:30 AM to 5 PM

**Closed** Tuesday, December 24 – Mid-February.

The Brinton Museum **ADMISSION** is **FREE** to all visitors! Thanks to a generous donation from **[Ramaco Carbon, LLC](http://web.archive.org/web/20251108092833/https://ramacocarbon.com/)** , we are able to waive our admission fees.  
Don’t miss this opportunity to visit The Brinton Museum this year.

**Ranch House Tours – $10**

  * May 23 to September 26
  * Offered every hour from 10am, 11am, 1pm, 2pm
  * 30 minutes duration

[Read More](/web/20251108092833/https://thebrintonmuseum.org/the-permanent-collection/the-historic-ranch-house)

**  
Ranch House & Grounds Tours – $15**

  * May 30 to August 22
  * Offered at 11am & 1pm
  * 1 hour duration

[Read More](/web/20251108092833/https://thebrintonmuseum.org/the-permanent-collection/the-historic-ranch-house)

**  
Leather Shop Tours** – $10 Suggested Donation

  * May 30 to September 30
  * Drop-in Friday, Saturday & Sunday between 10 am and 4pm
  * Learn about the history of leatherwork and the Sheridan Style tradition from resident artist and leatherworker, James F. Jackson
  * Approximately 30 minutes in duration

[Read More](/web/20251108092833/https://thebri...
admission_text:
## Become a Brinton Museum Member Today!

When you become a member of The Brinton Museum, you’re joining a community dedicated to preserving and celebrating the art, history, and culture of the American West. Your membership directly supports our exhibitions, educational programs, and the conservation of our extensive collections, helping us continue Bradford Brinton’s vision for generations to come.  
  
As a member, you’ll enjoy special benefits throughout the year, including free admission, discounts in The Brinton Museum Store, invitations to exclusive events, and early access to new exhibitions. Plus, with our gift membership option, you can share this enriching experience with friends and family—an ideal way to inspire and connect with others who appreciate Western art and culture.  
  
Join us in bringing the West to life! Become a member today and help us make a lasting impact.

[ Become a Member! ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251108101030/https://thebrintonmuseum.givecloud.co/membership)
